description: Handled decorative arrangements for wedding gifts (hantaran), designed custom invitations, and documented creative works through photography. Also responsible for managing inventory records, including tracking incoming and outgoing goods, and ensuring accurate bookkeeping to support daily operations.

Focused on the calibration and testing of electronic measuring instruments used in pharmaceutical production. Assisted in preventive maintenance, verified measurement accuracy through routine checks, and ensured all instruments complied with standard operating procedures and internal quality assurance protocols.
